 ring*connections between computers which doesn't require a server/star*connections between devices on a local server/bus*1 main cable sends data to multiple devices/network*where two or more devices are connected to share resources without going for a server/input*and input is there a physical analogue signal is converted to digital for a computer to read/output*we're a digital signal is converted to analogue so the user can see something/are*the computer users read only memory which is nonvolatile and random access memory which is volatile/hardware*a physical component of a computer such as the cpu/software*software is a program on the computer using code which converts sound to binary/binary*a cold of ones and zeros which means on and off for a computer switchboard/
